T02D1280:132b-0: @132b * // bung ba 'dod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
T02D1280:132b-2: # // bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1280:132b-3: de nyid ye shes rgyus skyes pa'i //
T02D1280:132b-4: longs spyod rdzogs sku phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1280:132b-5: shin tu bsdus par gyur pa yi //
T02D1280:132b-6: bung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya /
T02D1280:132b-7: dang po kho nar khams gsum thams cad sems tsam du shes par byas la /
T02D1280:132b-8: de nas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i gzugs chu
T02D1280:132b-9: skyes dmar po dang 'dra ba skad cig gis rdzogs
T02D1280:132b-10: par byas te / rang gi snying gar bcu drug phyed kyi padma shin tu dmar ba bsams la /
T02D1280:132b-11: de yi lte ba la a'a li yang dag par bsdus pa'i gzugs /
T02D1280:132b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rjes su chags
T02D1280:132b-13: pa'i yi ge aam dang h'um yang dag par yid
T02D1280:132b-14: kyis bris te / de nas h'um dang aam las
T02D1280:132b-15: byung ba shin tu dmar ba'i 'od zer yid bzo
T02D1280:132b-17: gur gum lta bu'i 'od zer de phyogs thams cad khyab ste /
T02D1280:132b-18: sems can thams cad rang gi gzugs su byas la de'i sku gsung thugs lhan cig tu bkug ste /
T02D1280:132b-19: h'um dang aam gnyis kyi thig le la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1280:132b-20: de nas h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1280:132b-21: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin bung ba'i gzugs /
T02D1280:132b-22: rin po che lta bu'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin me tog gi ro 'thungs pas brgyal ba /
T02D1280:132b-23: h'um gi ngo bo'i sgra rtag ring du sgrog pa /
T02D1280:132b-24: bdag med ma dang he ru ka'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1280:132b-25: de nas de'i snying gar tshon dmar po //
T02D1280:132b-26: ko ba'i chu lta bu'i thig le phra mo aam dang h'um gi yi ger bltas te /
T02D1280:132b-27: de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi bung ba srog gi rlung la zhon te /
T02D1280:132b-28: sna'i bu ga nas phyung la /
T02D1280:132b-29: khams gsum na gnas pa sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par byas te bsdu'o //
T02D1280:132b-30: yang dbugs kyi rlung la brten nas ji lta bar bya ste /
T02D1280:132b-31: rang gi snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la rab tu rnam par dag pa la gzhug par bya ste /
T02D1280:132b-32: gzhan gyi sku gsung thugs dang /
T02D1280:132b-33: rang gi sku gsung thugs gcig tu mnyam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1280:132b-34: de ltar yang dang yang du ji srid skad cig gis mthong gi bar du /
T02D1280:132b-35: dbugs la brten pa'i gzugs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1280:133a-0: @133a * // de ltar goms pa'i rting la skyes pa dang bud
T02D1280:133a-1: med kyi skad cig padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1280:133a-3: de'i ro bung ba srog dang rtsol ba la brten nas snga ma bzhin du byung ste /
T02D1280:133a-4: bdag nyid kyi snying gi me tog lte ba la gzhug par bya ste /
T02D1280:133a-5: skyes pa'i sna'i bu gar zhugs te /
T02D1280:133a-6: lus ngag yid gsum gyi gzugs /
T02D1280:133a-7: snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la 'dug ste de'i snying
T02D1280:133a-8: ga'i padma'i 'dab ma la lus kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1280:133a-9: rdul yod pa bdag nyid kyi lus bsgom /
T02D1280:133a-11: sems kyi rang bzhin padma'i snying po zos te /
T02D1280:133a-12: de nas sgrub pa pos rang gi dbugs kyi rlung bkug ste /
T02D1280:133a-13: skyes pa'i sna'i bu ga nas phyung la /
T02D1280:133a-14: bdag nyid sna'i bu ga nas snying gi padma'i ge sar la gzhug go //
T02D1280:133a-15: de ltar lus sprugs der lus kyang rang bzhin gyi chu skyes kyi rdul gnyis gcig tu byas /
T02D1280:133a-16: ngag gi rang bzhin gyi me tog gi khu ba gnyis gcig tu byas /
T02D1280:133a-17: sems kyi rang bzhin padma'i snying po gnyis gcig tu byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1280:133a-18: de yang de ltar spros pa dang /
T02D1280:133a-21: yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1280:133a-22: de yang dang yang du ji srid du rjes su chags pa mthong ba dang /
T02D1280:133a-23: ji ltar bsgom pa bzhin du shes nas byed de /
T02D1280:133a-24: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa grub par byed do //
T02D1280:133a-26: bud med dga' ba'i sems kyis chags par byed pa dang /
T02D1280:133a-28: sgrub pa po'i sems bde bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1280:133a-29: nyes pa yod par mthong na /
T02D1280:133a-30: ji ltar bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1280:133a-31: gal te byas na chen po'i sdig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1280:133a-32: de bas na sngon du yul dang yul ma yin pa shes par byas la /
T02D1280:133a-34: ji ltar bstan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1280:133a-35: bung ba 'dod pa sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1280:133a-36: rnam par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D1280:133a-38: dpal gyi snying rje thob par shog //
T02D1280:133a-40: grub pa brnyes pa'i ratna tsandras mdzad pa /
